apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this romantic emoji depicts two women sharing a tender kiss, their light and medium-light skin tones rendered with Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft, rounded edges. The facial expressions are gentle and loving, with closed eyes conveying intimacy and affection, enhanced by realistic lighting that highlights their features. This representation, consistent with Appleâ€™s inclusive emoji design, beautifully symbolizes love, connection, and same-sex relationships.
